entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm inland. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
